entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 9.1°C
Wind: SSE 44 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle or showers overnight. Fog. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Showers beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon. Fog dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
